articles.title: Greetings to 20th Ordinary Session of Assembly of Heads of State and Government of AU
articles.content:
Greetings to 20th Ordinary Session of Assembly of Heads of State and Government of AU
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Jan 25 sent a congratulatory message to the 20th ordinary session of the assembly of heads of state and government of the African Union due opening in Addis Ababa.
					Kim in the message said the AU's initiatives and efforts to strengthen the unity and solidarity among the countries on the continent in view of outside forces' domination and interference in their internal affairs and achieve regional peace, stability and socio-economic progress by their own efforts have elicited active support and sympathy from the Koreans and other world progressives.
					
					He reaffirmed the invariable stand of the DPRK to further expand and develop the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member nations onto a new high stage and wished the assembly greater success in promoting Africa's rehabilitation, sustainable development and common prosperity.

articles.title: Finnish President Hopes for Development of Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Finnish President Hopes for Development of Friendly Relations with DPRK
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador to Finland Pak Kwang Chol presented his credentials to Finnish President Sauli Niinisto on Jan. 22. 
					The president said the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un calling for bringing about a radical turn in building an economic power and improving the people's living standard has evoked big repercussions in the world. 
					
					He extended full support to the stand of the DPRK government to defuse the confrontation between the north and the south and implement the inter-Korean joint declarations. 
					
					He wished the DPRK success in its work for socio-economic progress for the welfare of the people. 
					
					He hoped that the friendly relations between the two countries will steadily develop on good terms.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung Military University and the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Sunday.
					The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues in humble reverence before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: WPK Secretaries Visit Lodgings of Secretaries of WPK Cells
articles.content:
WPK Secretaries Visit Lodgings of Secretaries of WPK Cells
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea visited lodgings of participants in the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Sunday.
					They included Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Kim Phyong Hae, Kwak Pom Gi and Mun Kyong Dok. They encouraged the participants in the meeting who contributed to strengthening the party and achieving the prosperity of the country.
					
					They instructed that the secretaries of the cells would discharge their mission and duty as standard-bearers of the revolution and struggle who would closely link the WPK with masses and thoroughly implement the party's line and policies.

articles.title: Participants in Meeting of WPK Cell Secretaries Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Meeting of WPK Cell Secretaries Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Fourth Meeting of Secretaries of Cells of the Workers' Party of Korea visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Sunday.
					They laid wreaths, bouquets and flowers before the graves of Kim Po Hyon and Ri Po Ik, the President's grandparents, and Kim Hyong Jik and Kang Pan Sok, the President's parents, before paying silent tribute to them.
					
					Then they went round historic data and relics displayed at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum and historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with great care.
					
					They also visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the National Gifts Exhibition House and the Museum of Arms and Equipment of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: People Send Aid Materials to KPA Service Personnel
articles.content:
People Send Aid Materials to KPA Service Personnel
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Officials and other people in North Hwanghae Province and Kaesong City of the DPRK sent aid materials to service personnel of the Korean People's Army.
					Among them were officials and people in such cities and counties as Sariwon City and Kumchon, Phyongsan, Jangphung and Yonthan counties.
					
					They sincerely prepared the goods.
					
					Service personnel who received the aid materials pledged to devotedly defend the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, and demonstrate the might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu in defending the country.
					
					They vowed to spur the military training to be fully ready to wipe out the provocateurs and aggressors and thus live up to the people's expectation. They said they will settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists, who regard jungle law as the rule of survival, by force of arms, not with words.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Break Will of DPRK: Minju Joson
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Break Will of DPRK: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- It is another wanton infringement on the sovereignty of the DPRK and an insult to its dignity that the UN Security Council adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against it over what it said "provocation", says Minju Joson in a bylined commentary Sunday.
					It goes on:
					
					Member nations of the UN Security Council blindly danced to the tune of the U.S. without their own opinions this time. Such behavior brought them dishonor.
					
					The U.S. is now seriously disturbing the peace and security of the world in wanton violation of international law, being obsessed by overconfidence and arrogance.
					
					If the U.S. is allowed to persistently resort to the highhanded and arbitrary practices and pursue its hostile policy towards the DPRK, it will be offered no option to develop science and technology as other countries do, and bolster up its defense capability, much less defending its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					It, in essence, amounts to the deprivation of the vital rights of the country and the nation.
					
					Even if others do not say what they want, being afraid of the U.S. pressure, and play into its hands, the DPRK can never do so.
					
					The DPRK has the powerful physical strength enough for reliably guaranteeing its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					Whatever the U.S. and its followers say about the DPRK, it will fully exercise its sovereignty and do everything it deems necessary for developing the country.
					
					It is the firm faith and will of all the servicepersons and the people of the DPRK to bring the U.S. to its knees by force of arms and win a victory in the decades-old showdown with it.
					
					The U.S. should clearly understand the faith and will of the DPRK which it declared before the world for the honor and dignity of the great Paektusan nation.

articles.title: U.S.-Masterminded UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-Masterminded UNSC's "Resolution" Rejected: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will never accept the UN Security Council's "Resolutions" Nos. 1718 and 1874, products of the U.S. hostile policy toward it. Therefore, it flatly rejects the recent UN Security Council's "resolution" that was adopted this time as their follow-up step. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					The DPRK is banned from any launches by the use of ballistic missile technology whether it is a missile for military use or a carrier rocket for civilian use, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					The Space Treaty stipulates that space shall be freely developed and used by all states consistent with international law on an equal footing without discrimination.
					
					The DPRK joined international space treaties including the convention on registering objects launched on outer space in March 2009. It was aimed to promote international trust and strengthen cooperation in the fields of space scientific research and satellite launch for peaceful purposes. It then launched satellites for peaceful purposes by strictly abiding by international law.
					
					The U.S. and its allies adopted the unreasonable "resolution" though they witnessed the DPRK's launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and admitted that it was a satellite.
					
					It is self-evident that there is no justification for the existence of the previous UNSC's "resolutions" which termed the DPRK's launch of satellites long-range missile launches, now that it has been clearly confirmed that the DPRK launched the satellite for peaceful purposes.
					
					The UNSC may adopt hundreds of more "resolutions" citing the previous "resolutions" that were unreasonably passed on. But they will all be censured and rejected by the DPRK.
					
					The DPRK will develop and launch more application satellites and more powerful carrier rockets in the future, too, no matter who says what.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Lambasted for Taking Lead in Adoption of UN "Resolution"
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Lambasted for Taking Lead in Adoption of UN "Resolution"
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK regards its sovereignty and dignity as its life and soul and will never pardon the hostile forces' arbitrary practices aimed at "sanctions" against it while groundlessly taking issue with its launch of satellite for peaceful purposes. Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a bylined article.
					It is the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea which took the lead in the adoption of the UN "resolution," the article notes, and goes on:
					
					By doing so, the Lee group committed the crime of screwing up the tension on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of war to the extremity. It is a scenario of the imperialist forces for aggression to gravely encroach upon the sovereignty and supreme interests of the DPRK and drive the situation on the peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension by terming the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes a "violation of UN resolutions" and adopting the new "resolution on sanctions" against it. They, in the long run, seek to ignite a war for aggression against it.
					
					The Lee group worked with bloodshot eyes to fake up the brigandish UN "resolution on sanctions." This is a height of its moves for unleashing a war of aggression against the DPRK. For the past five years of office the group has been keen on the moves against the DPRK, being backed by foreign forces.
					
					The Lee group, in the closing days of its office, is scheming to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost. Very dangerous is the reckless racket kicked up by the Lee group to ignite the war with the help of foreign forces while taking the lead in expanding "sanctions" on the DPRK under the pretext of its satellite launch.
					
					A touch-and-go situation in which a war may break out any time is being created on the Korean Peninsula and dark clouds of a nuclear war are hanging over there. The Lee group is to blame for this as it makes vicious challenges, pursuant to the U.S. moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK at any cost, while totally negating the legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					The Lee group is actively coming out as a shock brigade in kicking up the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK. It is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with fagot. The DPRK, as it had already declared, will wipe out the provocateurs with merciless retaliatory blows of justice and achieve the historic cause of national reunification if the group goes reckless under the pretext of implementing the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Censured for Making Rhetoric against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Censured for Making Rhetoric against DPRK
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Lee Myung Bak regime again picked up the DPRK over its measures for self-defense, far from bearing a responsibility for the present situation it created in alignment with foreign forces.
					Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak at a gathering of his stooges called for "getting fully ready", talking about "the north's provocation" and "deterrent". On the same day, puppet Minister of Unification Ryu U Ik criticized the DPRK's counteraction as "an extreme reaction", saying "the north is following a wrong way with passion".
					
					A bylined commentary of Rodong Sinmun Sunday dismisses the Lee regime's remarks as a scream of horror of those who were taken aback by the DPRK's declaration that it will not tolerate the enemies' aggressive challenges.
					
					The "sanctions" much touted by the Lee regime will get it nowhere but bring shame and destruction to it, says the commentary, adding:
					
					The regime's call for "getting fully ready", a remark to cover up its embarrassment with the DPRK's tougher reaction, amounts to a last-ditch effort of those who are at a loss being overwhelmed by the might of Songun.
					
					The Lee regime's rhetoric against the DPRK's self-defensive measures over the UN "resolution on sanctions" and its desperate efforts to put a brake on them will end in vain.
					
					No force on earth can block the advance of the army and people of the DPRK along the way of justice, the way for defending its sovereignty, with confidence in the justness of their cause.
					
					It is the steadfast will of the DPRK to firmly defend its dignified socialist system and achieve the historic cause of national reunification despite the enemies' vicious challenges.
					
					Only merciless punishment awaits those who challenge the just cause of the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup Targets DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Buildup Targets DPRK
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are planning to deploy two B-2 strategic bombers in their air force base on Guam, an island situated around the Korean Peninsula, according to a report.
					The bombers capable of loading nuclear bombs have been known as a means of aggression for mounting a surprise nuclear attack on the depths of the DPRK in case of contingency on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. imperialists plan to finish the deployment of the bombers with Stealth capabilities by early next month, describing them as typical reinforcement that would carry out the duty of precision strike at the major objects of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national preparatory committee to commemorate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Abuja on Jan. 21.
					Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events, including meeting, roundtable talks and film show, on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Activities of Kim Jong Un Reported by Newspapers of Iran, Kuwait
articles.content:
Activities of Kim Jong Un Reported by Newspapers of Iran, Kuwait
Pyongyang, January 27 (KCNA) -- Iranian and Kuwaiti newspapers reported news of the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					The Iranian paper Iran News on Jan. 21 said that Kim Jong Un visited the Taesongsan General Hospital under construction by the Korean People's Army. It went on:
					
					The hospital covering a total plottage of more than 100 000 square meters has three sick wards. It has all facilities for treatment and resuscitation.
					
					After being briefed on the construction of the hospital before a guide map, Kim Jong Un looked round its different places for a long while to learn in detail about its construction.
					
					He said that as he stressed while going round the hospital last year, it is important to provide all amenities favorable for healthcare and treatment of patients while building it splendidly and fashionably.
					
					Noting that a children's hospital, a dental hospital and a recovery center are to be built in the heart of Pyongyang this year, he said it is necessary to build them successfully by applying good experience gained from the building of the Taesongsan General Hospital so that they may be impeccable in any aspect.
					
					He called for successfully managing and operating the hospital.
					
					He underlined the need to raise the level of science and IT in the field of medical science in order to improve healthcare.
					
					After expressing satisfaction with the construction of the hospital, he extended thanks to the Korean People's Army Unit 462 for building it and promised to visit it again after its completion.
					
					On the same day the Kuwaiti paper Kuwait Times reported the same news with a photo of Kim Jong Un going around the hospital.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige reunion de funcionarios de ramas de seguridad estatal y exteriores
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige reunion de funcionarios de ramas de seguridad estatal y exteriores
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de sectores de la seguridad estatal y de las relaciones exteriores sobre la grave situacion creada en estos dias en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, convoco y dirigio la citada reunion para hacer frente a la situacion dada.
					
					En la ocasion participaron el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, el ministro de Seguridad Estatal Kim Won Hong, los secretarios del CC del PTC Pak To Chun y Kim Yong Il, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC Hong Sung Mu y el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kim Kye Gwan.
					
					El Mariscal escucho el informe sobre la situacion y las circunstancias creadas de nuevo en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Se crea la grave situacion en esta region debido a las maquinaciones de aplastamiento anti-RPDC sin precedentes por las fuerzas hostiles que han fabricado la brutal y provocativa "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestionando el lanzamiento exitoso de la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-3", que es el derecho legal del Estado soberano y que han reconocido tambien los organos especializados norteamericanos.
					
					Desde abril del ano pasado, la RPDC hizo ingentes esfuerzos por probar el caracter pacifico del lanzamiento del satelite asegurando la transparencia de mas de la costumbre internacional y optando adredemente el tiempo de lanzamiento cuando la situacion sea relativamente tranquila.
					
					Pero, las fuerzas hostiles, que planearon convertir el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite artificial en un motivo de aplastamiento anti-RPDC, negaron obstinadamente el derecho de esta a lanzarlo.  
					
					Las brutales acciones hostiles de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites, que violaron el derecho independiente del Estado soberano, reconocido en el plano internacional, a desarrollar el cosmos, demuestran que llego al climax la estrategia de hostilidad anti-RPDC de EE.UU. tendente a enfrentarse hasta el fin con la RPDC, sin abandonar la negacion y la hostilidad constitucional a la idea y el regimen optados por el pueblo coreano.
					
					De ahi que se han creado las graves dificultades ante los esfuerzos de la RPDC de concentrar las fuerzas a la construccion economica para hacer que los habitantes no aprieten por mas tiempo el cinturon, basandose en el disuasivo independiente de guerra preparado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante toda su vida.
					
					Aunque algunas partes interesadas prestaban la atencion a la solucion imparcial del problema y a impedir la agravacion de la situacion, ellas mismas reconocieron que hay limites sus capacidades.
					
					Asi, se ha probado otra vez el principio de que la soberania de la RPDC debe ser defendida solo con sus fuerzas propias.
					
					Ademas, se ha esclarecido que antes de realizar la desnuclearizacion del mundo no habra la de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					En la reunion el Mariscal expreso la decision resuelta de tomar las reales e intensivas medidas importantes estatales frente a la situacion creada, como fueron aclaradas ya en las declaraciones del CDN y del MINREX la posicion de tomar las fuertes contramedidas fisicas por defender la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del pais y presento a los funcionarios de los sectores correspondientes las tareas concretas.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a cumbre de jefes de Estado y Gobierno de UA
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a cumbre de jefes de Estado y Gobierno de UA
Pyongyang, 27 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que tendra lugar en Addis Ababa la XX Cumbre de los jefes de Estado y Gobierno de la Union Africana, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema (APS) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 25 un mensaje de felicitacion ante dicha reunion.
					El remitente senala que las iniciativas y los esfuerzos de la UA para fortalecer la unidad y la solidaridad de los paises del continente y lograr con sus fuerzas propias la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo socio-economico de la region haciendo frente a las maquinaciones de dominio e intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras suscitan el entero apoyo y la simpatia del pueblo coreano y los demas pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					
					Reafirma la invariable posicion de la RPDC de ampliar y desarrollar a una etapa mas alta las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion con la UA y sus paises miembros y desea grandes exitos en la labor de la presente cumbre para promover el enriquecimiento, el desarrollo sostenible y la prosperidad comun de Africa.
